name: Champion
description: Champions focus on raw physical power, athletic prowess, and relentless combat excellence.

3.name: Improved Critical
3.description: Beginning when you choose this archetype at 3rd level, your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

7.name: Remarkable Athlete
7.description: Starting at 7th level, you can add half your proficiency bonus (rounded up) to any Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check you make that doesn’t already use your proficiency bonus.

10.name: Additional Fighting Style
10.description: At 10th level, you can choose a second option from the Fighting Style class feature.

15.name: Superior Critical
15.description: Starting at 15th level, your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20.

18.name: Survivor
18.description: At 18th level, you attain the pinnacle of resilience. At the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier if you have no more than half of your hit points left.
